pr_title: do not prune segments for selection queries over upsert table

timeline.message: do not prune segments for selection queries over upsert table

timeline.bodyText: Can valid doc index be null if there are no more valid docs in that first segment? Or, is it guaranteed that this (potential optimization) will never happen
timeline.author: mcvsubbu

replies.bodyText:
For now, the implementation guarantees all segments (immutable+mutable) of upsert table have non-null valid docs, while the segments of append-only table have null values.
But it's a good question that if we will use this valid doc for other purposes. By design, this valid doc is quite general and we may consider other types of ingestion-time filtering.
replies.author: yupeng9
